TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PolygonHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class PolygonHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class PolygonHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: 定義 控制項中的多邊形作用點區域。

span.span: Defines a polygon-shaped hot spot region in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別定義中的多邊形作用點區域控制項。This class defines a polygon-shaped hot spot region in an control. 很有用的定義不規則形狀中的作用點區域控制項。The is useful for defining irregularly shaped hot spot regions in an control. 例如，您可以使用它來定義個別區域內的地圖。For example, you can use it to define individual regions within a geographical map. 若要定義的區域，將屬性設為字串，指定每個頂點的座標物件。To define the region of a , set the property to a string that specifies the coordinates of each vertex of the object. 多邊形頂點是兩個多邊形邊緣符合的點。A polygon vertex is a point at which two polygon edges meet. 當按一下物件、 頁面導覽至 URL、 產生回傳至伺服器，或不做任何動作。When a object is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 屬性會指定此行為。The property specifies this behavior. 若要瀏覽至 URL，設定屬性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，並使用屬性來指定要瀏覽至 URL。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要張貼至伺服器，設定屬性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，並使用屬性，以指定的名稱物件。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, and use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名稱將會傳入事件資料時按下。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. 如果您想物件沒有任何行為，請將設定屬性`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含三個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains three objects. 每個物件都代表在地圖上的地理區域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 當使用者按一下回傳至伺服器，並在標籤中顯示作用點的名稱與型別物件。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Class1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Class1/CS/polygonhotspot.class1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Class1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Class1/VB/polygonhotspot.class1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立物件，並將它加入至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object and add it to an control. 控制項可以包含其他兩個以宣告方式新增的物件。The control contains two other objects that have been added declaratively. 每個物件都代表在地圖上的地理區域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 當使用者按一下回傳至伺服器，並在標籤中顯示作用點的名稱與型別物件。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/CS/polygonhotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/VB/polygonhotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Coordinates { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 字串，代表 物件端點的座標。

span.span: A string of coordinates that represents the vertexes of a object.

value.span: 字串，代表 物件端點的座標。

span.span: A string that represents the coordinates of a object's vertexes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的頂點的座標物件。Use the property to specify the coordinates of the vertexes of a object. 多邊形頂點是兩個多邊形邊緣符合的點。A polygon vertex is a point at which two polygon edges meet. 您指定的字串必須格式化成以逗號分隔每個座標。The string that you specify must be formatted with each coordinate separated by a comma. X 座標和 y 座標，必須具有您指定的每個端點。Each vertex that you specify must have both an x- coordinate and a y-coordinate. 例如，字串"128185335157510224510383228383 」 定義具有五個端點的多邊形作用點。For example, the string "128,185,335,157,510,224,510,383,228,383" defines a polygon hot spot with five vertexes. 第一個頂點的 x 座標為 128。The x-coordinate of the first vertex is 128. 第一個頂點的 y 座標是 185。The y-coordinate of the first vertex is 185. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立物件，並將它加入至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object and add it to an control. 屬性用來指定的頂點的座標物件。The property is used to specify the coordinates of the vertexes of the object. 控制項可以包含其他兩個以宣告方式新增的物件。The control contains two other objects that have been added declaratively. 每個物件都代表在地圖上的地理區域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 當使用者按一下回傳至伺服器，並在標籤中顯示作用點的名稱與型別物件。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/CS/polygonhotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/VB/polygonhotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetCoordinates() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetCoordinates () As String

summary.span: 傳回字串，代表 物件端點的座標。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object.

returns.span: 字串，代表 物件端點的座標。

span.span: A string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回字串，代表的頂點的座標物件。The method returns a string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object. 這個方法會傳回的字串是目前的值屬性。The string this method returns is the current value of the property. 方法可在內部由 ASP.NET 來取得要使用的座標的文字呈現時。The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. 所傳回的字串是瀏覽器和標記語言特有的。The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，其中包含三個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains three objects. 每個物件都代表在地圖上的地理區域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 當使用者按一下物件、 回傳至伺服器。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server. 方法會擷取多邊形的頂點的座標，這樣就可以在標籤中顯示出來。The method retrieves the coordinates of the polygon's vertexes so that they can be displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/polygonhotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/polygonhotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]
